4. Repeat step 3 for the "250cc winner" and "motogp winner" columns to ensure that the win was not in any of these other categories as well.

2. Determine the relevant columns: Since we are interested in finding out if Marco Simoncelli won the 250cc race in round 9, we will focus on the "row", "grand prix", and "250cc winner" columns.
3. Find the row that corresponds to round 9: To find this, we look for the row where the "round" column value is 9. In our table, the row with index 9 corresponds to the British Grand Prix (4th of July).
4. Check if Marco Simoncelli won the 250cc race in that round: We then look at the "250cc winner" column for this row. If it matches "Marco Simoncelli", then our claim is true.
